attributes.description:
2012 ML 350 BE (NEW GEN ML) 4MATIC, FULL SERVICE HISTORY (MOSTLY BY MERCEDES BENZ), 154 000 KM’S, R 349 950.00, PRISTINE CONDITION.
We are Mercedes fans through and through, and as my previous adverts of the new generation ML state, this one is no different. WHAT A CAR. I’m simply in love with the new gen ML. The styling looks, design, comfort and drive are UN reviled in any SUV in this segment. Please don’t compare this to the old shape Mercedes ML, have a closer look, this is a completely different shape and car. 
What I love about the petrol is instant power delivery, there is no turbo lag, and the power is at the touch of the accelerator. 
WHAT MAKES THIS CAR SPECIAL?
•	Condition, condition, and condition it’s becoming increasingly difficult to find good condition well maintained used vehicles these days. 
•	Full service history
•	Spare keys
•	Satellite navigation
•	All original Mercedes Benz glass including windscreen 
•	Electric memory seats
•	Auto open/close boot function
•	Front and rear PDC
•	Reverse camera
•	Removable tow bar 
And much more….
